## Problem 2
```{r import dataset}
data("rest_inspec")
```

Clean dataset:
1. exclude na
2. mutate variable type
3. exclude unnecessary variables

```{r clean data}
rest_inspec = janitor::clean_names(rest_inspec)
rest_inspec = rest_inspec |>
  drop_na()|>
  mutate(inspec_date = as.Date(inspection_date)) |>
  mutate(grad_date = as.Date(grade_date)) |>
  select(-grade_date, -inspection_date) |>
  filter(!boro == "missing")
```

### Comparison of number of different grades in each borough 

```{r plot 1}
rest_inspec |>
  ggplot(aes(x = ))

boxplot = 
  rest_inspec |> 
  drop_na() |>
  group_by(cuisine_description) |>
  ggplot(aes(x = cuisine_description, y = score, fill = cuisine_description)) +
  geom_boxplot()+
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, hjust = 1))+
  labs(x = "Cuisine type", 
       y = "Inspection score",
       title = "Inspection score by cuisine type in each borough")

ggplotly(boxplot)

```
